entry.title: SuperF4 - 1.2
entry.content:
Released 1.2.
This update mainly brings support to StarCraft II and a few bug fixes. Another new thing is a native 64-bit executable (the installer will automatically install the correct executable). For more details, see the changelog below.

Changelog:
  • Added 64-bit executable. The installer will automatically install the correct executable.
  • Added support for alternative Ctrl+Alt+F4 detection (see SuperF4.ini). Enable this to make SuperF4 work in StarCraft II.
  • Added xkill to the tray menu (Win+F4).
  • Added manual update check to the tray menu.
  • Fixed the Shell_NotifyIcon error that appeared for some when SuperF4 was on autostart.
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English (x64) - Spanish (x64) - Galician (x64)
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)
Send feedback
Visit the author's website

entry.title: TrayCD - lock.exe
entry.content:
Uploaded a small console program, lock.exe, that can lock/unlock cd-rom drives. A locked cd-rom drive can't be ejected. Why would you need this? I do not know.

Visit the website
Download lock.exe
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.8
entry.content:
Released 0.8.
The new things since the beta are 64-bit support for HookWindows, the ability to configure what keys trigger the alt dragging, the ability to reconfigure what the mouse buttons do. I have fixed a few bugs, most notable: the alt key will no longer trigger the window menu! New language: Russian by Gluek. If you are updating from 0.7, there are a few more things as well, which were described in the last update.

Changelog:
  • Added AutoStick, enable it to make windows always stick without needing to press shift. This replaces StickyScreen.
  • Renamed ExperimentalFeatures to HookWindows, also improved it so resizing is now supported and windows should no longer flicker. 64-bit programs also work now. I no longer consider it experimental!
  • The alt key will no longer activate the window menu!
  • Added the ability to configure what keys should trigger the dragging, resizing, etc.
  • Added the ability to configure what the mouse buttons do. New actions: minimize and center.
  • Improved multi-monitor support a lot.
  • Tweaked the blacklist (see wiki).
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Korean - Russian
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.8 beta 2
entry.content:
Released 0.8 beta 2.
I am releasing this as a beta but it is still the most recommended version available. I have made some major changes and fixes, not to mention a few new features. First of all, I have completely redone the feature previously called ExperimentalFeatures. I renamed it to HookWindows since I no longer consider it experimental and I encourage you to try it out. A few other new things are AutoStick, an improved version of StickyScreen, and RMBMinimize which makes your right mouse button minimize windows. I have also done a lot of fixes to multi-monitor support. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa. Users of 0.7 and 0.8b1 won't be automatically notified of this version. I plan to support 64-bit windows with HookWindows for the stable 0.8.

Changelog:
  • Added AutoStick, enable it to make windows always stick without needing to press shift. This replaces StickyScreen.
  • Renamed ExperimentalFeatures to HookWindows, also improved it so resizing is now supported and windows should no longer flicker. I no longer consider it experimental.
  • Added RMBMinimize, enable it to minimize windows with the right mouse button.
  • Improved multi-monitor support a lot.
  • Tweaked the blacklist (see wiki).
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Korean
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: ShutdownGuard - 0.4
entry.content:
Released 0.4.
I finally got around to work some on ShutdownGuard. The biggest new feature is the ability to patch programs to prevent them from forcing the computer from shutting down. This is experimental (and disabled by default), read more on the wiki.
Another nice thing is that I have added a Reboot button to the shutdown dialog.
New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa.

Changelog:
  • Added the ability to patch apps (see wiki).
  • Added reboot button to the shutdown dialog.
  • Added Silent option.
  • Added HelpUrl option.
  • Language can now be changed in ShutdownGuard.ini.
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Lithuanian - Nynorsk
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: KillKeys - 1.1
entry.content:
Released 1.1.
This release fixes a crash that prevented the use of both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen at the same time. It also fixes many small bugs. No major feature added. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa.

Changelog:
  • Fixed crash when using both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen.
  • Language can now be changed in KillKeys.ini.
  • A lot of small bug fixes.

entry.title: SuperF4 - 1.1
entry.content:
Released 1.1.
This release fixes many small bugs and updating is recommended. No major feature added. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa. Alexander has also helped me fix some bugs, thanks! :)

Changelog:
  • Fixed mouse cursor not changing when pressing Win+F4 if Aero was disabled in Vista.
  • Mouse cursor now spans multiple monitors.
  • Language can now be changed in SuperF4.ini.
  • A lot of small bug fixes.
Visit the website

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.7
entry.content:
Released 0.7.
This version adds the ability to roll-up windows by double-clicking with the middle mouse button. I've also added a new feature called StickyScreen which makes windows automatically stick to the screen borders without needing shift. This only works with the Alt button unless you enable ExperimentalFeatures.
I have also fixed a few bugs with ExperimentalFeatures, so it's working really well now, give it a try.
In addition to that I've fixed a couple of small bugs, including an error message that sometimes popped up if you had AltDrag on autostart.
I've also updated the installer, so upgrading should be a breeze.

Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Korean
Discuss in the forum

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.6
entry.content:
Released 0.6.
This version fixes some small bugs, most notably one which made AltDrag ignore the -hide switch. It also adds the sticky behavior to resizing. There's a new language as well, Korean, thanks to 김장환 Jang-hwan Kim!
This version should no longer have any false positives on antivirus scanners since I no longer compress with upx.
I hope you find that the update checker was useful, let me know if you have feedback or questions, either via email or post in the forum (no registration required)!
You can use the installer to overwrite the old version, there is no need to uninstall the old version in advance.

entry.title: SuperF4 1.0, AltDrag 0.5, KillKeys 1.0 and TrayCD 1.0
entry.content:
I've released SuperF4 1.0, AltDrag 0.5, KillKeys 1.0 and TrayCD 1.0. Read the notes on their respective sites.
All my applications are now available in Spanish thanks to Fabrizio Ferri.
I have also opened a forum which I hope you'll use to discuss my tools, let me know what's good and what's bad.
I have also gotten some reports that my tools show up on some antivirus scanners, these are all false positives! I will try to report it to the antivirus vendors.
Finally, I would like to let you know that I have put donating details on the site, so if you feel one of my programs is useful, please consider donating money.

entry.title: ShutdownGuard - 0.3
entry.content: I've finally released ShutdownGuard 0.3 which addresses the problems that were introduced in the Unicode versions of 0.2. In addition to that I've implemented an update checker and the ability to configure the prevention message (example: Do not shut this server off!). The update checker will only check for updates and notify you when one is available, you will have to download and install the update manually. I've also added a translation for Lithuanian (thanks p|b!). The 7z archives of the other languages are available if you go to the downloads section (all languages are included in the installer). I've also added instructions on how to donate, read the Donate page. Merry Christmas everyone!

entry.title: ShutdownGuard localization and installer
entry.content:
I've just released a Spanish version of ShutdownGuard 0.2. Now it's easy to translate ShutdownGuard, so if you want to translate ShutdownGuard to your language, visit the Localize wiki page to find some easy instructions on how to do just that. Thanks to Fabrizio Ferri for translating the Spanish version!

I've also released an installer which contains both languages. Please report any problem you find.

entry.title: TrayCD - 0.3
entry.content: Changelog: * Can now manage multiple cdrom drives. * Use middle click on tray to open second drive. * New icons by Onyx Reyes, licensed under CC-BY-SA.

entry.title: KillKeys - 0.3
entry.content:
Note: Fixed a duplicate id so this entry might pop up as new, but it's OLD. Sorry!
Changelog: * Added option to disable keys in fullscreen. * Removed restriction of 100 keys. * Renamed log-keyhook.txt to killkeys-log.txt

entry.title: ShutdownGuard - 0.2
entry.content: Changelog: * Compatible with Vista. * Reordered shutdown dialog buttons. * Middle click on tray brings up the shutdown dialog.

entry.title: SuperF4 - 0.9
entry.content: Changelog: * You can now kill a process by pressing [the windows key]+F4 and then clicking the window with your mouse. Note that the mouse cursor does not change to reflect that SuperF4 is in this mode. You can press escape or the right mouse button to exit this mode without killing a program. * Renamed keyhook.dll to hooks.dll. * Renamed log file to superf4-log.txt.

entry.title: AltDrag
entry.content:
I've added an RSS feed specifically for AltDrag.
You can subscribe to it here.

entry.title: SuperF4 - 0.8b
entry.content: Changelog: * Fixed a typo.

entry.title: SuperF4 - 0.8
entry.content: Changelog: * Made the detection of Ctrl+Alt+F4 more secure, preventing faulty kills which could happen when SuperF4 didn't receive the keyup of the F4 key. * Only one instance of SuperF4 can now be run. Starting SuperF4 again will make the first instance add its tray icon if hidden.

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.4
entry.content: Changelog: * You can now hold the shift key to make the window stick to other windows.

entry.title: This feed
entry.content:
Hi everyone.
I will use this feed to notify you of updates to my tools and announce new tools.
These are all my tools right now:

  • AltDrag
  • KillKeys
  • TrayCD

You can view my Google Project Hosting profile.
